data.title: Hoffman Institute US
data.meta_description: Home of the Hoffman Quadrinity Process, a week-long in-person retreat. Feeling stuck? The Hoffman Process is for you.
data.text:
Tuition for the Hoffman Process is $5,350. This includes lodging, all meals and food, over 90 hours of professional instruction, individualized attention, all materials including post-Process manual and recordings, and a one-on-one post-Process call with your teacher.

Our waitlists consist of students that are already registered for an upcoming course. Once you register, you are given access to the required, extensive pre-Process assignment due 2 weeks prior to your program. Sold out programs regularly get last-minute openings, which are only available to those who have completed their pre-Process work. Register for the Process so you can begin your assignment. You can apply to be on a waitlist for any course that is already sold out.

We recognize the diversity of our community and believe that personal transformation should be accessible for all. As a non-profit, we have a scholarship fund. Please click here to learn about applications and availability.

Interested in attending the Process in Canada? Additional dates may be available at our Hoffman Canada site. To view dates and availability, click the button below!

Our waitlists consist of students that are already registered for an upcoming course. You can apply to be on a waitlist for any course that is already sold out.

We recognize the diversity of our community and believe that personal transformation should be accessible for all. As a non-profit, we have a scholarship fund. Please click here to learn about applications and availability.

Interested in attending the Process in Canada? Additional dates may be available at our Hoffman Canada site. To view dates and availability, click the button below!

For the Hoffman Essentials program, please find a private and quiet place where you will be uninterrupted, and where you can sit comfortably in front of your screen. Your space should be well lit; we want to be able to see you and connect with you! We also want to cultivate a safe and intimate place in which you can do your work, even though we are not together physically.

Tuition: $495

Special Tuition Rate: $350

Scholarship support available

For this program, you will need to be on video and participate! The program will take place in a private Zoom video conference room. The link will be sent to you prior to the program start date. If Zoom video conferencing is unfamiliar to you, please check out the link to Zoom tutorials here.
